title: Who is the best teacher on YouTube for IIT? - Quora

response.answer_text: It's very good that you are going to get your preparation done through video lectures. Because it is more time efficient than attending coaching classes. But as we search for the best teacher in coaching classes… Similarly we also need a good tutor's video lectures for out well preparation. If you are searching for free video lectures on youtube then I would like to suggest you that stop this. Because none of the free video lectures are authentic and complete. If you are still searching for such free videos then you are wasting your time. You will only get advertisements there. Even if you find a good one.. You will get it as incomplete upload. Instead of searching for free video lectures गो for paid video lectures like Kaysons… There you will be provided a guaranteed and complete course of your syllabus. Instead of this you will also be given test papers, practice papers and other study materials. All video lectures are been taught by IITians and all teachers are well experienced. There you will also be able to complete your course in efficient time and get sufficient time for revision too. They also provide you opportunity to test your preparation by appearing in all India test series. So go for paid video lectures and do your best there. All the very best!

Hi, Youtube has become an immense source of information where one can find videos on almost anything possible just like Google search. Not only these videos provide unrestricted access to useful content, lecture notes, tips, and tricks on JEE Main but they also provide an entertaining way of understanding concepts. Prof. Sumit Upmanyu A mentor who doesn't need any introduction in India. Reckoned as 'Miracle Man of JEE' in the country, this maestro of physics & chemistry knows very well how to develop students' brain by introducing toughest of concepts in the most lucid manner. It will save your precious time and provide the ease to learn concepts repeatedly. Here are some of the best Youtube channels that JEE Main aspirants can use to speed up their preparation in a less exhausting way.
